meanings.definition: A thin layer or coating of a spreadable substance, such as butter or cream cheese.
meanings.sent1: Mom spread a shmeer of cream cheese on my bagel for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The baker added a shmeer of butter to the warm bread.
meanings.sent3: The cat licked the shmeer of tuna fish off the plate when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The morning dew created a shmeer of moisture on the grass.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully applied a shmeer of paint to the canvas, creating a beautiful landscape.

meanings.definition: To spread or smear a substance over something.
meanings.sent1: Please shmeer the jam on the toast before serving it.
meanings.sent2: She shmeered sunscreen on her skin to protect it from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to shmeer chocolate sauce on their ice cream cones.
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly shmeered the sauce on the plate before placing the steak.
meanings.sent5: He shmeered glue on the paper to attach the colorful feathers for the art project.

meanings.definition: To apply or spread something in a smooth or even manner.
meanings.sent1: The baker likes to shmeer frosting on the cupcakes with precision.
meanings.sent2: She shmeered the foundation on her face for a flawless look.
meanings.sent3: The gardener will shmeer the mulch around the plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: He shmeered the peanut butter evenly on the bread for a tasty sandwich.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter will shmeer the varnish on the wood to protect it from damage.
